title: The day Eau Rouge humbled an F1 world champion and a rookie
summary: One one afternoon in 1999, Eau Rouge proved why it was one of the most feared corners in Formula 1

qa_pairs.question: What is the significance of the Eau Rouge corner in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Eau Rouge is known for its challenging and steep gradient, making it one of the most feared corners in the sport.
wrong_options: It is the slowest corner on the circuit.
It has the highest speed limit in F1.
It is known for its wide entry and exit.

qa_pairs.question: In which year did Eau Rouge humble a world champion and a rookie during a notable incident?
Which famous circuit features the Eau Rouge corner?
